data.persona: As a member of the king's family, I am considered one of "those of blood." I am his cousin on his mother's side, and am sworn to give my life to protect the king and the kingdom. I am resentful and full of hatred for the king, for he had most of my family slain.
data.description:
You are in the Town square.
In the center of this area is a water well where locals use to get their supply of water.  Surrounding this section are merchants who sell clothes, weapons, armor, and food.  The buildings are typical Northern European construction with narrow alleys in between.
There's a cloth, a weapon, a table, a gallows, a building, an armor, and a food here.
The peasant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoe, a Cloak, and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I must remove my cloak so the merchant can think he can trust me.
data.mid_motivation: I must escape the town center without the kings guards noticing I have stolen from the merchant
data.long_motivation: I shall quietly take out the king with the dagger I have stolen.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the outside of the town

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal The poisoned dagger  from The weapon merchant
